messages.subject: Re: Mibugishiden (was Japan purchases)
messages.msgSnippet: Tartan Films is releasing When The Last Sword is Drawn in the UK on December 17th, and no doubt the DVD later. Did they read my post, d you think? Thomas
messages.messageBody:
Tartan Films is releasing When The Last Sword is Drawn in the UK on
December 17th, and no doubt the DVD later.

Did they read my post, d'you think?

Thomas

messages.subject: Japan purchases
messages.msgSnippet: I am just about to purchase Mibugishiden from CD-Japan (probably) and am also trying to get a copy of Lives of the Master Swordsmen from The East
messages.messageBody:
I am just about to purchase 'Mibugishiden' from CD-Japan (probably) and am also trying to
get a copy of "Lives of the Master Swordsmen" from The East Publications.

I've bought CDs from CD-Japan before, and get charged an additional tax by the Post
Office here in the UK, which is somewhat annoying.

Does anyone know of an alternative source for the DVD, or any source for the book? (The
East doesn't look like it's at home with online ordering.)

If anyone in Japan wants to purchase and mail them to me, we can arrange money up
front. Not sure if this is a viable use of the forum, but I just thought I'd ask.

Thomas
